# makeComputeCommandEncoder()

**Instance Method**

Creates a compute command encoder.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeComputeCommandEncoder() -> (any MTL4ComputeCommandEncoder)?
```

## Return Value

The created [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4ComputeCommandEncoder] instance, or `nil` if the function fails.
